meanings.sent1: During the play, Sarah will impersonate a famous singer.
meanings.sent2: It is not right to impersonate a police officer.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, Tom decided to impersonate a superhero.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to impersonate different accents is truly impressive.
meanings.sent5: The actor's talent to impersonate famous personalities amazed the audience.

meanings.definition: Imitate the appearance or character of someone else.
meanings.sent1: The comedian can impersonate various celebrities perfectly.
meanings.sent2: It's fun to impersonate cartoon characters at a costume party.
meanings.sent3: The child tried to impersonate their favorite movie character.
meanings.sent4: She can impersonate her sister's handwriting so well.
meanings.sent5: The spy had to impersonate a waiter to gather information discreetly.
